semantics.label: Color Scheme on the Box
semantics.description: Determine which color scheme to use

semantics.label: Only Check-ins
semantics.description: Specifies whether the stream contains posts by the Page or just Check-ins from friends

semantics.label: Show Header
semantics.description: Specifies whether the header should be visible or not

semantics.label: Show Border
semantics.description: Specifies whether or not Borders should be visible

semantics.label: Show Faces
semantics.description: Specifies whether to display profile photos of people who like the page.

semantics.label: Show Stream
semantics.description: specifies whether or not the Stream from the Page is visible

semantics.label: Height
semantics.description: Set Height of the Faceook Page Feed

semantics.label: Width
semantics.description: Set Width of the Facebook Page Feed
